item.title: When Is a Git Repo Not a Git Repo?
item.author: Author
item.description: I was working on a project recently and I noticed that my git gutter wasn’t showing up in VS Code. Quick side note, for those that don’t know, a git gutter, diff decorator or VCS gutter is a small element that typically shows up on the side of your code files to indicate a change between your local copy of the file and that which the version control system is tracking.
